channel.title: Yay!
channel.description:
i got to like level 40 range 30 hp 10 prayer in only near 13-15 hours!!!!
oh and i THINK i found a glitch, i was like 1.5k xp from leveling to 40 range, and i leveled in hp, when i looked at my range i found it had got to 40 range when i leveld up in hp, also that happened like 4 or 5 times b4 to.......
think i fast leveld? or just slow or medium? ;D ;D ;D ;D ;D :| :| :confused: :o :P :rolleyes: :cool: :eek: :( :mad: :D ;) :)
every emote there is q p w 0

item.title: Yay!
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

To figure out if the people saying they can get 40 levels in an hour or so are just lying. In fact, they all are.

Read full topic

item.title: Yay!
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:12, topic:131682”][quote author=Samzter link=topic=182473.msg1664381#msg1664381 date=1186747468]
i could prob get 40 range in 2 hours i got 37 range in 1 hour and like 10min
[/quote]Thats a lie, I tested this. I gave an account 1k of each arrow type, each bow, and each bit of equipment(Got 20 def for this). According to this clock, it took nearly 6 hours of non stop training to get 40 ranged in non members.[/quote]

Lol, why did you bother doing that?

Read full topic

item.title: Yay!
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:12, topic:131682”][quote author=Samzter link=topic=182473.msg1664381#msg1664381 date=1186747468]
i could prob get 40 range in 2 hours i got 37 range in 1 hour and like 10min
[/quote]Thats a lie, I tested this. I gave an account 1k of each arrow type, each bow, and each bit of equipment(Got 20 def for this). According to this clock, it took nearly 6 hours of non stop training to get 40 ranged in non members.[/quote]He didn’t say in which one he got it, members or f2p but I’m quite sure that it’s members with a cannon.

Read full topic

and i don’t have the supplies

it might of been like 5 hours, infact yes it was.

item.title: Yay!
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:3, topic:131682”][quote author=Kaza link=topic=182473.msg1662408#msg1662408 date=1186663334]
15 hours is a long time, getting 40 range at the right places wouldn’t take more than 5 hours of non stop training if you had the supplies.
[/quote]
true, with the best arrows every time you leveled and used them. E.g. use iron then steel then mith then addy. You could level with ease. Not to mention having a cannon there with you. I suppose you could get 40 range in 5 hours or less.[/quote]

less than that sureley?

Read full topic

item.title: Yay!
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Kaza:

15 hours is a long time, getting 40 range at the right places wouldn’t take more than 5 hours of non stop training if you had the supplies.

true, with the best arrows every time you leveled and used them. E.g. use iron then steel then mith then addy. You could level with ease. Not to mention having a cannon there with you. I suppose you could get 40 range in 5 hours or less.

Read full topic
